title: Tighten numeric/range validation for track/event fields
scope: Add explicit numeric/range validation for key contract fields (e.g. confidence bounds, coordinate bounds, timestamp sanity).
Prefer failing with clear errors over silently clamping values.
Do not expand the schema; only validate existing fields more strictly.
acceptance: Out-of-range numeric values (e.g. confidence < 0 or > 1) fail validation with a specific error.
Coordinate sanity rules are explicit (e.g. lat/lon ranges if present; pixel coordinates non-negative if present).
Validation errors remain trust-first and actionable (field path + reason).

deliverables.title: Contract-level numeric and range validation helpers
acceptance: Validation checks include explicit numeric bounds for key fields.
Errors report the offending field path and invalid value.
evidence: A record with confidence out of range fails validation with a clear message.
A record with an invalid coordinate range fails validation with a clear message.

subtasks.title: Enumerate and implement explicit numeric bounds checks for core track/event fields.
done_when: Core numeric fields have explicit validation (bounds/type).
Validation failures include the invalid value and a clear reason.
